tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_trades (
    trade_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_date TIMESTAMP,
    trade_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    trade_currency VARCHAR(5),
    trade_type VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trader_id INT,
    cryptocurrency VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    currency_pair VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 4) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  currency VARCHAR(10),
  amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE trades (
  trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  buyer_id INT,
  seller_id INT,
  currency_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  trade_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_data (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cryptocurrency_type VARCHAR(50),
  trade_amount DECIMAL(18, 2),
  trade_date TIMESTAMP,
  trader_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
  transaction_id INT,
  trade_amount DECIMAL(18, 2),
  trade_date TIMESTAMP,
  trader_id INT,
  exchange_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES transaction_data(transaction_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (trader_id) REFERENCES trader_data(trader_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (exchange_id) REFERENCES exchange_data(exchange_id)
);
